title-group.article-title: NEW RESULTS ON REVERSE ORDER LAW FOR {1,2,3}- AND {1,2,4}-INVERSES OF BOUNDED OPERATORS

abstract.p: In this paper, using some block-operator matrix techniques, we give necessary and sufficient conditions for the reverse order law to hold for {1,2,3}- and {1,2,4}-inverses of bounded operators on Hilbert spaces. Furthermore, we present some new equivalents of the reverse order law for the Moore-Penrose inverse.
